channel.title: Help with adding a custom shop on server!
channel.description: I need help adding a custom shop on my server so I can add different items in each shop; I have a PI 317 running on a 624 server. Help please.

item.title: Help with adding a custom shop on server!
item.dc:creator: @TheHolyGrail TheHolyGrail
item.description:
@TheHolyGrail wrote:

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=508325.0

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding a custom shop on server!

item.title: Help with adding a custom shop on server!
item.dc:creator: @Optimus Optimus
item.description:
@Optimus wrote:

[quote=“aquatizscape, post:2, topic:442161”]Are you meaning current shops changing the items?
If so…open up shops.cfg or whatever your file is named.
type CTRL F, search for the item id that it already sells, and just change it to your new item id you wish.[/quote]

No, I’m meaning like adding a new shop to like a random npc or something.

Read full topic
item.source: Help with adding a custom shop on server!

Are you meaning current shops changing the items?
If so…open up shops.cfg or whatever your file is named.
type CTRL F, search for the item id that it already sells, and just change it to your new item id you wish.
